did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: San Mateo County Recorder's Office Records,
did.origination: San Mateo County (Calif.). Office of the County Recorder

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of California, Los Angeles. Library. Dept. of Special Collections.

did.physloc: Stored off-site at SRLF. Advance notice is required for access to the collection. Please contact the UCLA Library, Department of Special Collections Reference Desk for paging information.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use and Reproduction
userestrict.p: Property rights to the physical object belong to the UCLA Library, Department of Special Collections. Literary rights, including copyright, are retained by the creators and their heirs. It is the responsibility of the researcher to determine who holds the copyright and pursue the copyright owner or his or her heir for permission to publish where The UC Regents do not hold the copyright.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: COLLECTION STORED OFF-SITE AT SRLF: Advance notice required for access.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], San Mateo County Recorder's Office Records (Collection 2075). Department of Special Collections, Charles E. Young Research Library, University of California, Los Angeles.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of deeds, mortgages, liens, land claims, declarations, and abandonments of homestead recorded at the office of the County Recorder, San Mateo County between 1857 and 1872.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.corpname: San Mateo County (Calif.) Office of the County Recorder--Archives.
